name: copolymerization

the process of forming or making a copolymer : He had done extensive research on copolymerization. See
copolymerize
More examplesFewer examplesThis article is primarily concerned with chain copolymerization. The copolymerization reactions were conducted at 75 degrees C.Aliphatic polycarbonates are synthesized by copolymerization of CO2 with epoxide.
